review_blob: Love this Beer. One of my favorite hefeweizens. Aftertaste is pleasant too.
A really nice Red Ale. Amazing with Lime. Doesnt quite suit my fridge anymore.. There are better things out there
Extremely good with Lime. Very untraditional tho. I loved this beer until trying Widmer Bros. Hefeweizen
Probably the only fruit beer I like. It isnt offensive, however I cant see drinking a 6 pack by myself.... Too sweet
